ARTICLE.COMMENT: When a video game is a hit inside a virtual world.

X.T: Caleb Chung: Come play with Pleo the dinosaur
Caleb Chung: Playtime with Pleo, your robotic dinosaur friend

ARTICLE.COMMENT: CalebChung explains how he created Furby and Pleo.

X.T: The math and magic of origami | Robert Lang
Robert Lang: The math and magic of origami

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Using algorithms, some spectacular new origami results are now possible. This art is now even used for stents and space telescopes.

X.T: Researchers Launch Online Protein Folding Game

ARTICLE.COMMENT: A game aimed to help solving protein folding problems.

X.T: The Making of The Beatles: Rock Band

ARTICLE.COMMENT: The history and technology of Harmonix, the company which created Guitar Hero, Rock Band…

ARTICLE.COMMENT: PeterStruijf tells how he created his game: Krakow 1325 AD.

X.T: Steamed: Valve Software Battles Video-game Cheaters
